creator: hadithmv
descriptionHtml:
The official hadithmv app for Android.

This is a collection of over a thousand hadith in the Maldivian language, from books such as:
• 40 Nawawi
• Umdatul Ahkam
• Sahih Bukhari
• Sahih Muslim
as well as many others.
May Allah aid me in adding more. Ameen.

Features of the hadithmv app include:

• Unique:
First Dhivehi hadith app ever developed.

• Sourced:
Reference numbers match the hadith books.

• Searchable:
Easily look up hadith in both Arabic and Dhivehi.

• Diacritic-agnostic:
Supports Arabic search with and without tashkheel.

• Accessible:
Find, copy and share these hadith anywhere.

• Simple:
Clean and easy to use minimalistic interface.

• Lightweight:
Small app size and efficient code that loads up instantly.

• Cross-platform:
Available on the Web, Android and Windows 10.

• 100% free:
Fully featured, only a phone or computer required.

• Offline:
Works perfectly without an internet connection.

descriptionShort: The Maldivian Platform for Translations of the Sunnah
title: Hadithmv

creator: Hadithmv
descriptionHtml:
The Official Hadithmv app for Android.

This app contains around four thousand hadith in the Maldivian language, from books such as:
• Hisnul Muslim
• 40 Nawawi
• Umdatul Ahkam
• Parts of Bulughul Maram
• As well as several hadith from other books.

Hadithmv also includes the following Dhivehi translations:
-Dhivehi Quran Translation
-Bakurubey’s Quran Translation
-Part of Jaufar’s Quran Tafsir
-Tafsir of the Last Tenth of the Quran
-Arabic Dhivehi English Dictionary
-Barbahari’s Explanation of the Sunnah
-Creed of the Two Razees
-The Nullifiers of Islam
-The Four Foundations
-The Three Principles
as well as a Text Editor.

Features of the App:

• Unique:
First Dhivehi hadith app ever developed.

• Sourced:
Reference numbers match the hadith books.

• Searchable:

• Diacritic-agnostic:
Supports Arabic search with and without Tashkheel.

• Accessible:
Find, copy and share these hadith anywhere.

• Simple:
Clean and easy to use minimalistic interface.

• Lightweight:
Small app size and efficient code that loads up instantly.

• Cross-platform:
Available on the Web, Android and Windows 10.

• 100% free:
Fully featured, only a phone or computer required.

• Offline:
Works perfectly without an internet connection.

descriptionShort: The Maldivian Platform for Translations of the Sunnah
title: Hadithmv

creator: Hadithmv
descriptionHtml:
The Official Hadithmv app for Android.

This app contains around four thousand hadith in the Maldivian language, from books such as:
• Muwatta Malik (in progress)
• Umdatul Ahkam
• Bulughul Maram (in progress)
• 40 Hadith of Aajurry (in progress)
• 40 Hadith of Nawawi
• As well as various hadith from several other books.

Hadithmv also includes the following:
-Dhivehi Quran Translation
-Bakurubey’s Quran Translation
-Jaufar’s Quran Tafsir
-Tafsir of the Last Tenth of the Quran

-Arabic Dhivehi English Dictionary
-Al Eegaal Arabic Dhivehi Dictionary

-Barbahari’s Explanation of the Sunnah
-Creed of the Two Razis
-The Nullifiers of Islam
-The Four Foundations
-The Three Principles

-a Text Editor.


Features of the App:

• Unique:
First Dhivehi hadith app ever developed.

• Sourced:
Reference numbers match the hadith books.

• Searchable:
Easily look up hadith in both Arabic and Dhivehi.

• Diacritic-agnostic:
Supports Arabic search with and without Tashkheel.

• Accessible:
Find, copy and share these hadith anywhere.

• Simple:
Clean and easy to use minimalistic interface.

• Lightweight:
Small app size and efficient code that loads up instantly.

• Cross-platform:
Available on the Web, Android and Windows.

• 100% free:
Fully featured, only a phone or computer required.

• Offline:
Works without an internet connection.
